jd: From: Sanjay Kumar, Siriinfo sanjay.kumar@siriinfo.com Reply to: sanjay.kumar@siriinfo.com HiMyself Sanjay Kumar and I am looking for Alation, Data Governance, Data Quality management (DQM)Please check and let me knowRole name:AnalystPlano, TX- Onsite from day 1’stContract to hireRole Description:Understand the Hub-Spoke D&A setup of the business Working closely with Customers to migrate the Data Quality and Catalog components to SaaS / Data observability solution Metadata management activities and business rules to perform data quality validation Document / Creation of Wiki pages for understanding the Data Management migration process / roadmap Bi-weekly stakeholder updates on status of work and delivery timelines Having strong Analytical skills, logical reasoning, and good communication skillsCompetencies:Alation, Data Governance, Data Quality management (DQM)Experience (Years):6-8Essential Skills:Experience working in Information Management Data Governance & Data Quality Hands on experience in Date Governance product such as IBM InfoSphere (IGC, IA), Alation, BigEye Strong in SQL, Microsoft Excel; Working knowledge on SNOW Familiarity in Alation and BigEye Possess Analytical ability and problem-solving skills to analyze and interpret data Excellent communication (written and oral) and Articulation skills Understand Information management and Data Quality concepts as per DAMA standardsDesirable Skills:Date Governance product such as IBM IGC, IA and experience in Data Migration projects will be a plus
